pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Normality Tests // A suite of multivariate normality tests (Mardia, HenzeZirkler, Royston, DoornikHansen, Energy), univariate diagnostics, robust outlier detection, bivariate density plots, and BoxCox transformations (Korkmaz et al, (2014), https://journal.r-project.org/archive/2014-2/korkmaz- goksuluk-zararsiz.pdf).
